About

Spoon is developed in the LIFL (Computer-Science Laboratory of Lille) in Lille, France.

This is where Spoon was born (first window of the last floor, right side of the M3 building).

Spooners

From left to right: Renaud Pawlak (aka Master Yoda), Nicolas Petitprez (aka Little Padawan), and Carlos Noguera (aka Luke Spoonwalker)
